pages.title: Kamen Rider Glare
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/vision_driver_glare)Vision Driver (Glare)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Slow Falling IV$(li)Jump Boost VI
